item.title: a proof of “life is unpredictable”
item.description: Wanna known if a person’s life is predictable. Suppose there is a procedure like this: \[P(l\quad p)=\begin{cases} true,\quad life \ is \ predictable &\\ false, \quad life \ is \ unpredictable & \end{cases}\] and we got a procedure to test if it is correct: (define diag (lambda (p) (if (P p p) (other-than (p p)) false))) where other-than’s definition is: (define other-than (lambda (x) (if (eq? x 'a) 'b 'a))) other-than is always output the opposite of input.
